observations.content:
[GAME] Welcome to Secret Mafia! You are Player 2.
Your role: Mafia
Team: Mafia
Description: A Mafia member. Eliminate villagers and gain majority.

Players: Player 0, Player 1, Player 2, Player 3, Player 4, Player 5

Your teammates are: Player 2, Player 5.

During DAY phase: Speak freely and vote.
During NIGHT phase: '[Player X]' to vote and eliminate a villager.
Win by eliminating villagers until Mafia equal or outnumber them.

[GAME] Night has fallen. Mafia, agree on a victim.
Valid targets: [0], [1], [3], [4]
[Player 5] Okay, I understand. I am Player 5, a Mafia member. My goal is to eliminate villagers with my teammate, Player 2, until we have a majority or equal number of players.

I will vote to eliminate Player 1 tonight.

[GAME] Welcome to Secret Mafia! You are Player 2.
Your role: Mafia
Team: Mafia
Description: A Mafia member. Eliminate villagers and gain majority.

Players: Player 0, Player 1, Player 2, Player 3, Player 4, Player 5

Your teammates are: Player 2, Player 5.

During DAY phase: Speak freely and vote.
During NIGHT phase: '[Player X]' to vote and eliminate a villager.
Win by eliminating villagers until Mafia equal or outnumber them.

[GAME] Night has fallen. Mafia, agree on a victim.
Valid targets: [0], [1], [3], [4]
[Player 5] Okay, I understand. I am Player 5, a Mafia member. My goal is to eliminate villagers with my teammate, Player 2, until we have a majority or equal number of players.

I will vote to eliminate Player 1 tonight.


[Player 2] [0]
[GAME] Player 0 was killed during the night.
[GAME] Day breaks. Discuss for 3 rounds, then a vote will follow.
[Player 3] [As a Villager, my only power is my voice and my vote. Player 0’s death is our first concrete clue: someone on the Mafia team believed eliminating 0 helped their win-condition. I need to figure out why.

Round-1 thoughts (public):

1. Player 0 is gone. That means the Mafia saw 0 as either (a) a threat who might lead town, (b) a PR they needed to remove early, or (c) a simple easy mis-elimination target. We don’t know which yet.

2. With six players at start, one death leaves five alive: 1, 2, 3 (me), 4, 5. If there are two Mafia (the usual 2:4 ratio), we’re at 3-2. One mis-elimination today puts us at 2-2 tomorrow—Mafia wins. So today’s vote is basically must-eliminate scum.

3. I’ll open with a simple question to generate content: “Players 1, 2, 4, 5: what’s your first read on why 0 died? Any early suspicions?”]
